00135   protected function processLogs( $logs = array( ) )
00136   {
00137     try
00138     {
00139       $_logFile = $this->getLogPath() . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . $this->getLogFile();
00140 
00141       if ( @filesize( $_logFile ) > $this->getMaxFileSize() * 1024 ) $this->rotateFiles();
00142 
00143       //  Write out the log entries
00144       foreach ( $logs as $_log )
00145       {
00146         $_exclude = false;
00147 
00148         //  Check out the exclusions
00149         if ( !empty( $this->_excludeCategories ) )
00150         {
00151           foreach ( $this->_excludeCategories as $_category )
00152           {
00153             //  If found, we skip
00154             if ( trim( strtolower( $_category ) ) == trim( strtolower( $_log[2] ) ) )
00155             {
00156               $_exclude = true;
00157               break;
00158             }
00159 
00160             //  Check for regex
00161             if ( '/' == $_category[0] && 0 != @preg_match( $_category, $_log[2] ) )
00162             {
00163               $_exclude = true;
00164               break;
00165             }
00166           }
00167         }
00168 
00172         if ( !$_exclude ) error_log( $this->formatLogMessage( $_log[0], $_log[1], $_log[2], $_log[3] ), 3, $_logFile );
00173       }
00174 
00175       //  Processed, clear!
00176       $this->logs = null;
00177     }
00178     catch ( Exception $_ex )
00179     {
00180       error_log( __METHOD__ . ': Exception processing application logs: ' . $_ex->getMessage() );
00181     }
00182   }
00183 
00192   protected function formatLogMessage( $message, $level = 'I', $category = null, $time = null )
00193   {
00194     if ( null === $time ) $time = time();
00195 
00196     $level = strtoupper( $level[0] );
00197 
00198     return @date( 'M d H:i:s', $time ) . ' [' . sprintf( '%-' . $this->_categoryWidth . 's', $category ) . '] ' . ': <' . $level . '> ' . $message . PHP_EOL;
00199   }
